page.title: 12DUNVANT RUGBY CLUB
page.content: {Dunvant Rugby Club.} The Club will celebrate its centenary in 1987.Although principally a rugby club,two cricket teams are also run,the first team being runners-up in the Swansea League 1st. Division this year.Twelve rugby teams are organised catering for boys from under 9 years of age to three senior teams.They have played first class teams in the Schweppes Cup. The Club purchased its own ground in 1957 for Â£500.There are 3 pitches and a club house.In recent years a carnival has been organised to fund various rugby tours.The club is also supported by various fund-raising activities such as barbecues,dances, treasure-hunts etc..It is a very well supported club with excellent facilities.There is also a Ladies' Section and a Rugby Club Choir.
